data.message: New album coming!!! Ready for war?

replies.message: No, its from an old song that he do with Biggie
Maybe a mobile game...Since it says #ShadyWars!
I don't think he did that song with Biggie... the song is called "kill you"

Its dead wrong remix. He didnt do it with biggie em wasnt rappin mainstream then. He wouldnt of even had infinite out when big did dead wrong. Eminem took the original and made a remix with the machetes n swords verse in it. ;) #rapgod - EMINEM
Oo okay sorry Kyle Wade  i know the song kill you

When I was just a little baby boy my mama used to tell me these crazy things. She used to tell me that my daddy was an evil man, she used to tell me he hated me. But then I got a little bit older and I realised she was the crazy one, but there was nothing I could do or say to try and change it, cos thats just the way she was.

They said I cant rap about being broke no more. They aint say I cant rap about coke no more. Slut! You think I wont choke no whore till her vocal chords wont work in her throat no more?
These motherfuckers be thinking im playing, cause they think that im thinking of this shit, just to be saying it. Put your hands down bitch I aint gonna shoot you, im'a pull you to this bullet and put it through you. Shut up slut your causing too much chaos, just bend over and take it like a slut, ok ma?  

Thats kill you Kyle Wade
It was an unfinished biggie song and em hopped on the last verse
You really are a lyricist Paul
It's a game on his website not  a new album
